description:
Leap, stick, and swing your way through the enchanting realms of Tongue Tale â€“ a vibrant 2D platformer where you step into the webbed feet of a fearless blue frog!

- Sticky Mechanics: Master the art of the tongue! Use it not just to snack flies, but also to cling to walls, swing over gaping chasms, and outplay your foes.
- Vast Worlds Awaiting: Journey through 7 beautifully hand-crafted worlds, each bursting with unique challenges, secrets, and charming aesthetics.
- Boss Battles: Confront and defeat 7 unforgettable bosses, each guarding their domain with unique skills and strategies. Test your wits and reflexes against these formidable foes.
- Story: As the blue frog, embark on a mission that will see you restoring balance to the amphibian world.
- Party Mode: Battle your friends and use all the movement techniques your tongue offers to you to outplay them in 80+ minigames!
- Dark World: If you are looking for an extra challenge, play Dark World and climb the leaderboards.

Can you navigate the challenging terrains, overcome the daunting bosses, and prove that even a tiny frog can rise to hero status? Get ready for Tongue Tale!
name: Tongue Tale
intro:
Join our little frog on a journey to save its world!
Battle your friends in party mode!
